name: SparseAttributes_t
desc: A structure that represents the attributes of a matrix.

items.name: init(transpose: Bool, triangle: SparseTriangle_t, kind: SparseKind_t, _reserved: UInt32, _allocatedBySparse: Bool)
items.desc: Returns a new attributes structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new sparse attributes structure.

items.name: var transpose: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to implicitly transpose the matrix.

items.name: var triangle: SparseTriangle_t
items.desc: An enumeration that specifies which triangle unit-triangular, triangular, and symmetric matrices need to use.

items.name: struct SparseTriangle_t
items.desc: A structure that defines which triangle a symmetric matrix stores, or whether a triangular matrix is upper or lower.

items.name: var kind: SparseKind_t
items.desc: An eumeration that specifies whether the matrix is ordinary, unit-triangular, triangular, or symmetric.

items.name: struct SparseKind_t
items.desc: A structure that defines whether the matrix is ordinary, symmetric, or triangular.
